build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan storage:link && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT:-8080}

production.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build
production.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan storage:link && php artisan optimize && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT:-8080}
